channel.title: Islam on Truth about Islam
channel.description: Recent content in Islam on Truth about Islam

item.title: History
item.author: mustafa@islamtruth.org (Mustafa Khan)
item.description: Where did Islam come from? That is, indeed, a good question. And a difficult one to answer. There are barely any sources from the early time of Islam, but we do know a lot more about what happened after that.

item.title: Vocabulary
item.author: mustafa@islamtruth.org (Mustafa Khan)
item.description: As islam is heavily based on the arabic language, which is not widely known outside of islam countries, I have listed a few of the slang that muslims would be familiar with.
